name: SANDWICH
description:
You play as SANDWICH, an advance computer who doesn't know where he is. All he knows is that he has a gun and that evil power lines are rampaging the area. They will kill him. He must do whatever it takes to survive, even kill.

Left and Right arrow keys are movement. Down and Up arrow keys are to hide under the desk. Z and C are to shoot. Left Shift is to reload and start the game. And R is to restart.

Try to get as many points as possible. Sadly no high score system yet, but write the highest you got in the comments. If you find any bugs, please tell me. I'll try to fix them as quickly as possible.
